title: [BUG] MLflow Projects Run fails for windows Absolute paths
body:

For help with debugging your code, please refer to [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/mlflow).

### Describe the problem
Running mlflow projects commands with a full path fails with
stderr: 'fatal: 'C:/Users/eddeleon/path/to/project' does not appear to be a git repository
fatal: Could not read from remote repository.

However passing relative paths like "." or "./to/project" works as expected.

### Code to reproduce issue

git clone https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow-example
pip install mlflow
pwd
mlflow run {abs path from pwd}/mlflow-examples


### Other info / logs
Include any logs or source code that would be helpful to diagnose the problem. If including tracebacks, please include the full traceback. Large logs and files should be attached.
